name: JinkAniArtMod
title: Jinker's Animated Art Pack
description:
Collection of Animated Art for use with VTT's in the top-down/overhead perspective. All files are in transparent webm format. Files will be located in your Data\modules\JinkAniArtMod\AnimatedArt folder.

If you like my work consider becoming a Patron to ensure I keep creating content for Foundry. Preview/Download
author: Jinker#8073
